nodes.bodyText: Could you please check that POST, GET, PUT and DELETE requests can be made. For example parameterized test can be of help here.

You have to create an additional instance of run configuration. Otherwise the test class will fail once tests execution order is different which is possible since junit 4 doesn't have any guarantees on tests execution order.
